title: Modding
content:
You asked for it, and here it is, on a trial basis. If you guys make good use of it, it'll stay. If it turns out maybe you don't need it after all, it'll get pruned.

When this forum began there were 20+ subsections, I don't want to see that happen again.

title: Re: Modding
content:
We asked for it?

No I think it was mostly Globox's whining, asking for it.

Regardless I am interested to see how this will pan out. I don't visit K:M myself so maybe this can keep me up to date on all the cool mod junk people are working on.

Ether way... Neat-O!-----------------------

title: Re: Modding
content: I forgot my username for K:M anyways, so... yeah, more advertising for the [url=http://qsilver90.com/files/Rkeen4.zip]RKeen[/url] series!

title: Re: Modding
content:
Ah, yeah, seems they got what they wanted.. Now let's just see if this was a good addition..

Can someone capitalize the Keen word in this section's description? (And end it with a full stop..)3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Modding
content: That grammar error sets a bad example for our forum. If only I was and admin... nah, that would cause mass chaos.

title: Re: Modding
content:
I never whined for it, Gal. I noted that a whole bunch of people wanted this.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: Modding
content: right now its a bit empty, but thats ok. All this place needs is a few sticky topics with all the useful facts on modding, links to mods etc. (what ever) and a few weeks and it will be excellent.

title: Re: Modding
content:
Clicking all the stuff with a "New" icon next to them, wondering where all the threads had gone for a minute there... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
I'm not sure, but perhaps there are some threads about mods in other (sub)forums (when there wasn't a specific modding forum yet) that can be moved here.
Being "empty" isn't a bad thing anyway if you ask me, it'll only take time for it to get fleshed out a bit.Retodon8
